definitions.body: :Je 23:19 tempest;—abs. ´[[ס]] Am 1:14 + 5 t.; [[סָָעַר]] Ps 55:9; pl. sf. [[סַעֲרֶיְ]] Ps 83:16; —tempest, esp. fig.: of passionate acts of men, [[מֵרוּחַ סׂעָה]] [[מִסָָּעַר]] Ps 55:9 (´[[מִסּ]] here awkward, without [[ו]]); of ´[[י]]'s wrath Je 23:19 ([[מִתְחוֹלֵל]] ´[[ס]]), cf. Je 25:32, Je 30:23; tempest as instr. of ´[[י]]'s wrath, Ps 83:16 (‖ [[סוּפָה]]); v. also [[בְּסַעַר בְּיוֹם סוּפָה]] Am 1:14 and Joe 1:4, Joe 1:12.
